article.title: General Atomics to Provide Eight MQ-9 Reaper Aircraft
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: General Atomics Aeronautical Systems Incorporated, Poway, California, is being awarded a $50 million contract modification for six MQ-9 Reaper production aircraft and two MQ-9 Reaper aircraft that will be utilized as ground maintenance devices.Â Aeronautical Systems Center, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity.
